definitions.definition: A leader who, according to Sunni eschatology , will appear and restore peace and justice before the end of the world.
examples: Ahmadis consider Mirza Ghulam Ahmed to be the Mahdi .

definitions.definition: Muhammad b. Hasan al-Mahdi , the last of the Twelve Imams , born in 868 AD but believed alive and present in this world in a state of occultation ; Similarly to Sunni belief, he will reappear before the end of time.
